official_title: A resolution relative to the election of Members to the standing Committee of the House of Representatives on House Administration.

summary.text: Elects the following-named Members to the standing committee of the House of Representatives on House Administration: Samuel L. Devin, Ohio; William L. Dickinson, Alabama; James C. Cleveland, New Hampshire; James Harvey, Michigan; Orval Hansen, Idaho; Philip M. Crane, Illinois; John Ware, Pennsylvania; Victor V. Veysey, California; and Bill Frenzel, Minnesota.

titles.title: A resolution relative to the election of Members to the standing Committee of the House of Representatives on House Administration.
